trans-unit.target: splinter of Inferno magicite<tab>splinters of Inferno magicite<tab>Inferno Magicite<tab>Creates a simulacrum of Ifrit, Lord of the Inferno, based off the wielder's memories of past encounters with the primal.
splinter of Crag magicite<tab>splinters of Crag magicite<tab>Crag Magicite<tab>Creates a simulacrum of Titan, Lord of Crags, based off the wielder's memories of past encounters with the primal.

splinter of Vortex magicite<tab>splinters of Vortex magicite<tab>Vortex Magicite<tab>Creates a simulacrum of Garuda, Lady of the Vortex, based off the wielder's memories of past encounters with the primal.
splinter of elder magicite<tab>splinters of elder magicite<tab>Elder Magicite<tab>Creates a simulacrum of Odin based off the wielder's memories of past encounters with the elder primal.
